name: Starship Hijackers
description:
"-and gloopo translates to 'Turn Right'. You got all that?"

Tommy Toad is recruiting for his ring of hijackers. The target? Alien Spaceships under too little surveillance. The easy part? Breaking into the ship, you've done that your whole life. The hard part? Glorbop isn't your native language, so take a good look at the controls before you forget what each of them do. 

NOTE: For faster load times, download the exe. 

Controls:

Click on the console buttons of your starship to navigate it.

Avoid obstacles, any damage to the ship is taken out of your cut. 

At $0 you might as well not even show your face to Tommy.

Team:

  • Edwin Meyer (Programming, 3D Art)
  • Samuel Lederer (Programming, 2D Art)
  • Charlie Lederer (Music)
